title: Mayo-Free Chicken Salad With Kimchi, Ginger, and Scallions Recipe
full_text:
Mayo-Free Chicken Salad With Kimchi, Ginger, and Scallions Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
8 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
4
cups
shredded cooked chicken meat
(from about
1
(
3-pound
) roast chicken)
1
cup
drained kimchi
, chopped
1/2
cup
diced celery
(about
1
large
rib)
1/4
cup
toasted pine nuts
or sesame seeds
1/4
cup thinly sliced
scallion
, white and light green parts only (about
2
medium
scallions)
3
tablespoons
kimchi liquid
3
tablespoons
distilled white vinegar
3
tablespoons
vegetable oil
2
teaspoons
grated fresh ginger
1
teaspoon
toasted sesame oil
Kosher salt
and freshly ground black pepper
Sliced bread
and frisee, if serving as a sandwich
Directions
In a large bowl, toss together all ingredients to combine thoroughly. Season with salt and pepper and serve as a light salad or on bread as a sandwich. Salad can be refrigerated in an airtight container overnight.
